text:
Many people host .jar and .jnlp files and have to add these mime types manually.
The lines are:

application/x-java-jnlp-file jnlp
application/java-archive jar

You could also use for JNLP:

type=application/x-java-jnlp-file desc="Java Web Start" exts="jnlp"
creator: keith@cs.oswego.edu

text:
As you might have read in the docs of mod_mime, we only accept registered
MIME-types for inclusion in the mime.types.

http://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/application/

java-archive doesn't show up there and x-types are never registered.
creator: nd@perlig.de
